title: What happens if you send friend request to friend that has maximum friends?
body:
Hi, i want to know what kind of message you get if you send the friend request to the friend that has full friend list.
does it give you the special message when i send the friend request through typing their name down and send request?
or do the guy who has the full friend list determine if he accepts or not?

replies.body: no, it won say anything.but if that guy clicks accept and then he has to delete someone from his friendlist or otherwise he will not be able to add u
